body.name: 12PCS Action Figure Risers Stands 6inch for Display, Figure Toy Support Holder Base Accessories with Peg, Compatible with Mavel Legends/ GiJeo Classified Series etc. most 1/12 Scale Figures, 6
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 22 hrs 56 mins
features: FIT FOR - FIGURESLAB’s Action Fgure Display Risers suitable for most 6 inch action figures such as compatible with Mavel Legends Series/ GiJeo Classified Series/ D C / Mo tu, etc. figures. Each riser was designd with a peg about 3.35-3.5mm at the bottom for directly use, you just need to insert the figures’ feet into the peg for display for doing different shows.

VARYING SIZE - Comes with 12pcs black action figure riser stands which is sufficient quantity to use, includes with 6 x different sizes risers separately in a bundle, whcih give you options in variety of heights between each pedistal that are included, makes them great for displaying small figurines so they are easier to view. Important Tips: 1, PLEASE confirm the peg size before buying; 2, PLEASE NOTE that the package does not include figures.

SUPERIOR & LONG LASTING ACTION FIGURE DISPLAY RISERS - FIGURESLAB display riser stands are hollow however they are very sturdy and attractive, clean from scratches, well molded, smooth edge with no imperfections and very stylish with quality, easy assembly and replace your action figures.

MAKE ANY COLLECTION LOOK ELEGANT - This one is quite cool and fun for showing off your figures, makes them look more elegant. Excellent for displaying in cabinets, trade show display, home display, party, shop window, office show room, table, business, museum etc. in a limited space.

Excellent for displaying in cabinets, trade show display, home display, party, shop window, office show room, table, business, museum etc. in a limited space. GREAT FOR DISPLAYING FIGURES COLLECTIONS - Design with classic black color, it can meet any scenes perfectly. Great gifts for fans who like to collect figures or if someone plan on having a collection.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: We have been working very hard on creating a stand that will work with the bulk of these figures and are very happy with the final result.

(Pls attention peg size before purchase) Important Tips PLEASE NOTE that the package does not include figure;PLEASE confirm the size before buying, otherwise it will not be the right size for your action figure;MEASURE your figures first. If they have a hole in the foot and not all figures have the same size peg hole, make sure to check that it is deep enough to fit in a stand. If the hole is shallow, no stand is going to hold them well.

VERSATILE DISPLAY PIECES Look Just As Classy Designed with pegs, fit for most 6inch figures. Black color look just as classy and doesn't show dust.You will like the different heights that are included and you can position how u need them to be positioned.Very easy to maneuver around a display and it’s very versatile. You don’t have to line it up exactly as pictured, you could separate a few of them and use the others on a different shelf, let your figures look like a professional display.

What are the risers dimensions? The tallest is 3.74” high and 2.5” dimensions to smallest 0.79” high and 2” dimension, 6 different heights that are included. What figures can these risers fit? The peg size is 3.30-3.35mm, which compatible with Mavel Legends/ GiJeo Classified Series/ D C / Mo tu, etc. most 6inch figures. Do these riser display stands work on the 6 inch Back Series or Mavel legends figures? Fits almost all Mavel Legends and Black Series figures and other 1:12 figures. Whether the figures easy to fall off, and how can u let the staff stable? These risers are designed with a peg each riser stand free from falling, and you just need to insert the figure feet into the base in a walking pose, very convenient to use. Are they easy to cracked? No, they are made of high quality plastic materials, not acrylic. All were covered in shrink wrap so no scratches and look just as classy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice stands at a good price
reviews.reviewText: I got 30 pieces for the price of around $20 - 25 peg stands and 5 pose stands. The pose stands are rather cheap, I put a small figure in one and suspended it, only to have the stand sag with the weight of the figure. Might be better for just standing, rather than action posing. The peg stands have worked great so far with two lines of figures - Star Wars 6" black series figures and some Four Horsemen Studios Mythic Legions figures. There were times when I needed to warm the foot in order for the peg to fit in, but otherwise, these provide a nice tight fit and a stable stand. Happy with the purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Best I have found so far.
reviews.reviewText: Accommodates Black Series and Vintage Collection good. I just wish they were a bit wider for the figures to properly stand. They do not tip over when a figure is placed. These are the best I have so far found, and price is very reasonable for the amount you get. The design makes them great to be displayed anywhere.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Didn’t work for my action figures
reviews.reviewText: I have 6 inch marvel legend action figures and they did not work at all with them. The pegs on the stands were too big for the holes on the bottom of their feet so it didn’t work out. To bad, the various highs would have been great for display.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Specific To Vintage 3.75" GI Joe Figures
reviews.reviewText: The pack that I received features one thousand peg stands divided into clear, black, round, and rectangle stands. I also received a small pack of repair accessories for the classic 3.75" GI Joe figures. Please note that these peg stands are meant strictly for those figures, so they may not fit other figures in your collection. The stands are durable, look professional, and keep my classic figures standing tall. If you're in need of stands for your classic GI Joe figures, pick this kit up.
